typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Pto.expedic./Pto.recepción} as string,
		{Denominación1} as string,
		{Destinatario mcía.} as string,
		Nombre1 as string,
		{Nº de transporte} as string,
		{Agente servicios} as string,
		Nombre2 as string,
		Entrega as string,
		{Posición} as string,
		{Tipo de posición} as string,
		{Denominación2} as string,
		Material as string,
		{Texto breve material} as string,
		{Cantidad entrega} as string,
		{Unidad medida base} as string,
		{Fe.mov.mcía.real} as string,
		{Documento modelo} as string,
		{Nº de pedido} as string,
		{Creado el} as string,
		{Identif.externa 1} as string,
		{Identif.externa 2} as string,
		{ID tracking transp.} as string,
		{Clase expedición} as string,
		{Denominación3} as string,
		{Ruta p.transporte} as string,
		{Denominación4} as string,
		{Fe.planif.registro} as string,
		{Stat.tot.mov.mcía.} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SourceXLSXTrans
SourceXLSXTrans select(mapColumn(
		PtoExpedicPtoRecepcion = {Pto.expedic./Pto.recepción},
		Denominacion1 = {Denominación1},
		DestinatarioMercancia = {Destinatario mcía.},
		Nombre1,
		NTransporte = {Nº de transporte},
		AgenteServicios = {Agente servicios},
		Nombre2,
		Entrega,
		Posicion = {Posición},
		TipoPosicion = {Tipo de posición},
		Denominacion2 = {Denominación2},
		Material,
		TextoBreveMaterial = {Texto breve material},
		CantidadEntrega = {Cantidad entrega},
		UnidadMedidaBase = {Unidad medida base},
		FeMovMercanciaReal = {Fe.mov.mcía.real},
		DocumentoModelo = {Documento modelo},
		NPedido = {Nº de pedido},
		Creado = {Creado el},
		IdentiExterna1 = {Identif.externa 1},
		IdentiExterna2 = {Identif.externa 2},
		IDTrackingTransp = {ID tracking transp.},
		ClaseExpedicion = {Clase expedición},
		Denominacion3 = {Denominación3},
		RutaPTransporte = {Ruta p.transporte},
		Denominacion4 = {Denominación4},
		FePlanifRegistro = {Fe.planif.registro},
		StaTotMovMercancia = {Stat.tot.mov.mcía.}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
SelectColumns derive(PtoExpedicPtoRecepcion = trim(PtoExpedicPtoRecepcion),
		Denominacion1 = trim(Denominacion1),
		DestinatarioMercancia = trim(DestinatarioMercancia),
		Nombre1 = trim(Nombre1),
		NTransporte = trim(NTransporte),
		AgenteServicios = trim(AgenteServicios),
		Nombre2 = trim(Nombre2),
		Entrega = trim(Entrega),
		Posicion = trim(Posicion),
		TipoPosicion = trim(TipoPosicion),
		Denominacion2 = trim(Denominacion2),
		Material = trim(Material),
		TextoBreveMaterial = trim(TextoBreveMaterial),
		CantidadEntrega = trim(CantidadEntrega),
		UnidadMedidaBase = trim(UnidadMedidaBase),
		FeMovMercanciaReal = trim(FeMovMercanciaReal),
		DocumentoModelo = trim(DocumentoModelo),
		NPedido = trim(NPedido),
		Creado = trim(Creado),
		IdentiExterna1 = trim(IdentiExterna1),
		IdentiExterna2 = trim(IdentiExterna2),
		IDTrackingTransp = trim(IDTrackingTransp),
		ClaseExpedicion = trim(ClaseExpedicion),
		Denominacion3 = trim(Denominacion3),
		RutaPTransporte = trim(RutaPTransporte),
		Denominacion4 = trim(Denominacion4),
		FePlanifRegistro = trim(FePlanifRegistro),
		StaTotMovMercancia = trim(StaTotMovMercancia)) ~> TrimColumns
TrimColumns sink(input(
		PtoExpedicPtoRecepcion as string,
		Denominacion1 as string,
		DestinatarioMercancia as string,
		Nombre1 as string,
		NTransporte as string,
		AgenteServicios as string,
		Nombre2 as string,
		Entrega as string,
		Posicion as string,
		TipoPosicion as string,
		Denominacion2 as string,
		Material as string,
		TextoBreveMaterial as string,
		CantidadEntrega as string,
		UnidadMedidaBase as string,
		FeMovMercanciaReal as string,
		DocumentoModelo as string,
		NPedido as string,
		Creado as string,
		IdentiExterna1 as string,
		IdentiExterna2 as string,
		IDTrackingTransp as string,
		ClaseExpedicion as string,
		Denominacion3 as string,
		RutaPTransporte as string,
		Denominacion4 as string,
		FePlanifRegistro as string,
		StaTotMovMercancia as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> DestintarionSynapseTrans
